de.feu.showgo.ui.tree

Class NavTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.feu.showgo.ui.tree.NavTree

  • public class NavTree
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the navigation tree shown in the left half of the main window. It shows persons, plays, ensembles and productions. Actions may be performed using a right click on an element. These actions are defined in the TreeElement subclasses. The tree should be refreshed after a model change using the refreshXYZ methods.

      Instantiates a new nav tree.

      • refreshPersons

        public void refreshPersons()
        Refreshes the persons in the tree. Should be called after inserting or removing a person from the model.

      • refreshPlays

        public void refreshPlays()
        Refreshes the plays in the tree. Should be called after inserting or removing a play from the model.

      • refreshEnsembles

        public void refreshEnsembles()
        Refreshes the ensembles in the tree. Should be called after inserting or removing an ensemble from the model.

      • refreshProductions

        public void refreshProductions()
        Refreshes the productions in the tree. Should be called after inserting or removing a production from the model.

      • refreshTree

        Refreshes the complete tree
